title: Account Manager with SEO Knowledge
job_overview:
???? We're Hiring: Account Manager
Visit us: Upgrade to see actual info
Are you a proactive communicator with a passion for SEO and client success? Click4Corp is looking for an experienced Account Manager to take the lead in managing key client relationships and driving digital growth through strategic SEO execution.
About the Role:
As an Account Manager, you’ll be the primary liaison between our clients and internal teams. Your mission? Ensure client satisfaction by aligning SEO strategies with business goals and delivering measurable results. From campaign oversight to performance reporting, your communication skills and digital expertise will play a key role in our clients’ success.
What You’ll Be Doing:
• Serve as the main point of contact for assigned clients
• Build and nurture long-term client relationships
• Translate client goals into actionable SEO strategies
• Coordinate and manage on-page, off-page, and technical SEO efforts
• Monitor campaign performance and provide clear, data-driven reports
• Proactively identify challenges and offer effective solutions
• Stay up to date on SEO trends and best practices
• Collaborate with internal teams to ensure timely and high-quality delivery
• Work with WordPress-based websites as needed
What We’re Looking For:
• 2+ years of experience in account management (preferably in a digital agency)
• Solid knowledge of SEO (keywords, content, backlinks, technical)
• Strong written and verbal communication skills
• Experience juggling multiple accounts and meeting deadlines
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and client-focused
• Proficient with Google Analytics, Search Console, SEMrush
• Able to work 8AM–5PM CST (Dallas time, non-negotiable)
Bonus If You Have:
• Experience using project management tools (e.g., Teamwork)
• Familiarity with PPC, email marketing, or social media strategies
Why Join Click4Corp?
• Collaborative, forward-thinking team culture
• Clear paths for professional growth
• Opportunity to work with a variety of businesses and industries
• Make a real impact in the digital space
Ready to grow with us? 
Apply now and let’s build something great together.
Visit: Upgrade to see actual info

How to Apply:
Send link of resume and your vacaroo Upgrade to see actual info introducing yourself and why we should hire you with your salary expectation
